mapper.select: SELECT MDD.COMPANY_CD , MDD.DIVISION_CD , MDD.DO_NO , MDD.SEQ , MDD.ITEM_ID , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MI.ITEM_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MDD.COMPANY_CD, MDD.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MDD.DELIVERY_UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MDD.COMPANY_CD, MDD.DIVISION_CD, MDD.DELIVERY_UOM ) FROM DUAL) AS DELIVERY_UOM_NM , MDD.CONVERSION_UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MDD.COMPANY_CD, MDD.DIVISION_CD, MDD.CONVERSION_UOM ) FROM DUAL) AS CONVERSION_UOM_NM , (SELECT MOM_STOCK_PKG.FN_GET_DR_REQUEST_QTY_BY_DO(MDD.COMPANY_CD, MDD.DIVISION_CD,MDD.REFERENCE_DTL_NO) FROM DUAL) AS DR_REQUEST_QTY , MDD.DO_QTY AS ISSUE_WAIT_QTY , MDD.CURRENCY_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MDD.COMPANY_CD, MDD.DIVISION_CD, 'SM0017', MDD.CURRENCY_CD, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS CURRENCY_NM , MDD.EXCHANGE_RATE , MDD.UNIT_PRICE , MDD.AMOUNT , MDD.LOCAL_AMOUNT , MDD.IO_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_IO_TYPE_NAME(MDD.COMPANY_CD, MDD.DIVISION_CD, MDD.IO_TYPE) FROM DUAL) AS IO_TYPE_NM , MDD.REFERENCE_NO , MDD.REFERENCE_DTL_NO , ROWIDTOCHAR(MDD.ROWID) AS KEY_ID , MDD.DELIVERY_ORDER_ID , MDD.DESCRIPTION , MDD.UPDATE_BY AS UPDATE_USER_NO , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MDD.COMPANY_CD, MDD.DIVISION_CD, MDD.UPDATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS UPDATE_USER_NM , TO_CHAR(MDD.UPDATE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDATE_DATE FROM MOM_DELIVERY_ORDER_DTL MDD , MOM_ITEM MI WHERE MDD.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MDD.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MDD.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MDD.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MDD.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MDD.DO_NO = #{doNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY MDD.SEQ
